document_data.caption: Masakito (left) battles Takako (right).
document_data.name: Masakito
document_data.mainbody: '''Masakito''' was a [[human]] [[fighter]] of [[Kara-Tur]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Having four older brothers, Masakito grew up feeling he had to prove himself and escape from out of their shadows. Thus, to win renown and fortune, he went on many missions and quests, no matter how dangerous or beyond his ability.
document_data.History: He once fought with the ninja [[Takako (ninja)|Takako]].{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1991|115|Masakito}}<ref><ref group="note">This is inferred from the art used for both characters' cards being reused from the cover of ''Night of the Seven Swords''.
